name: date
description: Date and time parsing, formatting, and manipulation for PIE
author: PIE Team

functions.name: now
functions.description: Get current Unix timestamp (seconds since epoch)

functions.name: now_millis
functions.description: Get current time in milliseconds since epoch

functions.name: format
functions.description: Format a Unix timestamp using strftime format string

functions.name: format_iso
functions.description: Format timestamp as ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS)

functions.name: format_date
functions.description: Format timestamp as date only (YYYY-MM-DD)

functions.name: format_time
functions.description: Format timestamp as time only (HH:MM:SS)

functions.name: parse
functions.description: Parse a date string using strptime format and return Unix timestamp

functions.name: parse_iso
functions.description: Parse ISO 8601 date string and return Unix timestamp

functions.name: get_year
functions.description: Extract year from timestamp

functions.name: get_month
functions.description: Extract month (1-12) from timestamp

functions.name: get_day
functions.description: Extract day of month (1-31) from timestamp

functions.name: get_hour
functions.description: Extract hour (0-23) from timestamp

functions.name: get_minute
functions.description: Extract minute (0-59) from timestamp

functions.name: get_second
functions.description: Extract second (0-59) from timestamp

functions.name: get_weekday
functions.description: Get day of week (0=Sunday, 6=Saturday)

functions.name: get_weekday_name
functions.description: Get weekday name (e.g., 'Monday')

functions.name: get_month_name
functions.description: Get month name (e.g., 'January')

functions.name: add_seconds
functions.description: Add seconds to timestamp

functions.name: add_minutes
functions.description: Add minutes to timestamp

functions.name: add_hours
functions.description: Add hours to timestamp

functions.name: add_days
functions.description: Add days to timestamp

functions.name: diff_seconds
functions.description: Get difference in seconds between two timestamps

functions.name: diff_minutes
functions.description: Get difference in minutes between two timestamps

functions.name: diff_hours
functions.description: Get difference in hours between two timestamps

functions.name: diff_days
functions.description: Get difference in days between two timestamps

functions.name: is_leap_year
functions.description: Check if year is a leap year (returns 1 for true, 0 for false)

functions.name: days_in_month
functions.description: Get number of days in the month

functions.name: start_of_day
functions.description: Get timestamp for start of day (00:00:00)

functions.name: end_of_day
functions.description: Get timestamp for end of day (23:59:59)

functions.name: start_of_month
functions.description: Get timestamp for first day of month at 00:00:00

functions.name: end_of_month
functions.description: Get timestamp for last day of month at 23:59:59
